comment.author: 59356674@N05
comment._content: My guess is north eastern Nigeria, possibly near Kano, judging by the the horses, the majority headgear and the robes. The stockade looks west Africanish, too.

comment.author: 59541897@N03
comment._content: i do agree with the above, 1st thot on ma mind is around kano of northern nigeria

comment.author: 23244172@N00
comment._content: I'm fairly sure that this is from what is now either the Adamoua or North Provinces of Cameroon, perhaps in/near N'Garoundere. One can still see architecture like this in these areas (the two provinces border one another).
